member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA
member.summary: Contains the scalable metrics associated with the nonclient area of a nonminimized window. This structure is used by the SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS and SPI_SETNONCLIENTMETRICS actions of the function.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. The caller must set this to sizeof(NONCLIENTMETRICS). For information about application compatibility, see Remarks.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iBorderWidth
member.summary: The thickness of the sizing border, in pixels. The default is 1 pixel.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iScrollWidth
member.summary: The width of a standard vertical scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iScrollHeight
member.summary: The height of a standard horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iCaptionWidth
member.summary: The width of caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iCaptionHeight
member.summary: The height of caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.lfCaptionFont
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the caption font.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iSmCaptionWidth
member.summary: The width of small caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iSmCaptionHeight
member.summary: The height of small captions, in pixels.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.lfSmCaptionFont
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the small caption font.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iMenuWidth
member.summary: The width of menu-bar buttons, in pixels.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.iMenuHeight
member.summary: The height of a menu bar, in pixels.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.lfMenuFont
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the font used in menu bars.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.lfStatusFont
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the font used in status bars and tooltips.

member.name: NONCLIENTMETRICSA.lfMessageFont
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the font used in message boxes.

summary.para: The thickness of the padded border, in pixels. The default value is 4 pixels. The iPaddedBorderWidth and iBorderWidth members are combined for both resizable and nonresizable windows in the Windows Aero desktop experience. To compile an application that uses this member, define _WIN32_WINNT as 0x0600 or later. For more information, see Remarks.
Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP/2000: This member is not supported.
